title: Fox MX Presents | Pura Vida Motocross
description: Ricky Carmichael and Fox Brigade rider Austin Forkner recently took a road trip to La Fortuna de San Carlos, Costa Rica. Their plan, ride the Montaña de Fuego motocross track situated below the Arenal volcano before it erupted. Check them out as they blast volcanic ash deep inside the Costa Rican rainforest. Pura Vida!
